original_text: For the husband is the head of the wife as Christ is the head of the church, his body, of which he is the Savior.
korean_text: 이는 남편이 아내의 머리 됨이 그리스도께서 교회의 머리 됨과 같음이니 그가 바로 몸의 구주시니라

sentences.original_text: For the husband is the head of the wife
as Christ is the head of the church
of which he is the Savior
